body_html: NHWC will be supported by converting to NCHW internally back and forth. Our experience is that in most cases that is okay. If you absolutely don't want that overhead, you can switch your entirely model to NCHW through data_format, and that will be fine. If for some ops, NCHW support isn't available, either a conversion can be added, or add new support.

body: NHWC will be supported by converting to NCHW internally back and forth. Our experience is that in most cases that is okay. If you absolutely don't want that overhead, you can switch your entirely model to NCHW through data_format, and that will be fine. If for some ops, NCHW support isn't available, either a conversion can be added, or add new support.
